alert.note: Alert for Boise Mountains; Camas Prairie; Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 08 at 1:03PM MST until December 09 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 PM MST FRIDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Snowfall of 3 to 6 inches, except 5 to 10 inches for terrain above 600 feet. Heavy snow possible Saturday and Sunday. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches, except 8 to 18 inches over the mountains possible. * WHERE...Portions of southwest and west central Idaho and northeast Oregon. Including the Interstate 84, Highway 55, and Highway 21 corridors. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 5 PM this afternoon to 5 PM MST Friday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Friday evening through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Boise Mountains; Camas Prairie; Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains
